title: S12 Ep236: Animals and the Other Side
itunes:title: Animals and the Other Side
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS warms your heart with tales of Animals & The Other Side with Christopher Fleming.

Do our pets return to us in spirit form? Can they reincarnate and return to us a different form of pet or species? Chris Fleming shares fantastic insights and true stories of animals and the other side PLUS a remarkable new Theater of the Mind.

http://christopherfleming.com/

https://www.facebook.com/chrisflemingOfficial

www.Harrys.com/darkness
